repo.description: The most widely used Python to C compiler
repo.name: cython

body:
This PR is simplified version of #6406. Related to #5242. This PR does not support does not contain controversial parts of #6406.

This PR does not supports array size initialization with const variables.

commit.message: Support of global const variables simplified

repo.description: The most widely used Python to C compiler
repo.name: cython

milestone.description:
* Remove code for Python 2 and Python < 3.8.
* Integrate better with Python 3.
* Improve support for the Limited API.
* Start supporting GIL-free Python 3.13.
* Support the Py3.13 `sys.monitoring` API.
* Support and use `am_send` for coroutines.

title: Support of global const variables simplified
